text: Another day, another adorable Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton PDA session! See their cutest kissing pics EVER, here! Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton ‘ s lives basically consist of constant, mushy PDA, so it seems crazy to say that they upped the ante in new pics. But they managed to do the impossible! Gwen shared a sweet and intimate moment with her boyfriend on Instagram, which appears to have happened in the greenroom at her Las Vegas residency show. In the pics, which you can see below, Gwen and Blake are kissing tenderly, and she shows the whole moment, from their adoring gaze, to her leaning in for the kiss, and their warm embrace.
